cause.description:
Students against the deforestation of the rainforest of South America.
1. Deforestation is harmful to the world's environment.
2. Cattle farmers are cutting down more and more forest all of the time.
3. Animals' habitats are being destroyed, and the food chain is terribly messed up.
cause.mission: Stop the deforestation of the Amazon Rainforest.
cause.name: Students Against Amazon Deforestation
